movie.title: Something the Lord Made
movie.plot: A dramatization of the relationship between heart surgery pioneers Alfred Blalock and Vivien Thomas.
movie.awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 17 wins & 30 nominations.

events.title: Vivien Thomas and Alfred Blalock perform the first ever operation for Blue Baby syndrome
